room_title: Escape room "Mayday" by Escape Plan Nashville in Nashville
review: My family and I had such a great time doing this. Very well thought out and so much fun! We got out with 1 second left if that says anything :) Would definitely recommend over and over again!!

room_title: Escape room "Mayday" by Escape Plan Nashville in Nashville
review: It was a really fun experience we laughed a lot and it was a really entertaining game thanks a lot for the fun

room_title: Escape room "Mayday" by Escape Plan Nashville in Nashville
review: This was so much fun for my daughters and I. Although we didn't escape, we learned a lot about each other in certain situations and it forces you to communicate unlike before. The experience was very immersive and the setting was such that you felt like you were in that situation. I can't say enough good things about the experience. I can see how this mobile escape room would be a valuable tool for any company wanting to build teamwork relationships among their employees. I highly recommend Escape Plan Nashville to anyone wanting an adventure.
